com.github.kskelm.baringo

Class ImageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kskelm.baringo.ImageService

  • public class ImageService
extends java.lang.Object
    Services related to manipulating images in Imgur (why we're here, assumedly)
    Author:
    Kevin Kelm (triggur@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getImageInfo

        public Image getImageInfo(java.lang.String id)
                   throws BaringoApiException
        Given an image id, return info about the Image object for it.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the image, for example "PgZtz0j". If a user is logged in and this image is theirs, the deleteHash property will be filled in. It will otherwise be null
        Returns:
        Image object
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something went pear-shaped

      • uploadUrlImage

        public Image uploadUrlImage(java.lang.String Url,
                            java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.String albumId,
                            java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String description)
                     throws BaringoApiException
        Upload an image to Imgur by pointing at a Url on the internet. Must be available openly without authentication.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS or AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        Url - the full URL of the image.
        fileName - original of the file being uploaded (pick something)
        albumId - the name of the album, the album's deleteHash if it's anonymous, or null if none
        title - title of image or null if none
        description - description of image or null if none
        Returns:
        The new Image object. If this is anonymous, hang on to the delete hash or you won't be able to manipulate it in the future!
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something terrible happened to Stuart!

      • uploadLocalImage

        public Image uploadLocalImage(java.lang.String mimeType,
                              java.lang.String fileName,
                              java.lang.String albumId,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String description)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              BaringoApiException
        Upload an image to Imgur as a stream from the local filesystem. Use a buffered stream wherever possible!

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS or AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        mimeType - mime type like image/png. If null, Baringo will try to infer this from the fileName.
        fileName - name of the file being uploaded
        albumId - the name of the album, the album's deleteHash if it's anonymous, or null if none
        title - title of image or null if none
        description - description of image or null if none
        Returns:
        The new Image object. If this is anonymous, hang on to the delete hash or you won't be able to manipulate it in the future!
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Something was wrong with the file or streaming didn't work
        BaringoApiException - que sera sera

      • downloadImage

        public long downloadImage(java.lang.String imageLink,
                          java.io.OutputStream outStream)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          BaringoApiException
        Given an image id and an output stream, download the image and write it to the stream. It is the caller's responsibility to close everything.

        NOTE: This is synchronous.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        imageLink - the image link to download (could be a thumb too)
        outStream - an output stream to write the data to
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - could be anything really
        BaringoApiException - Imgur didn't like something

      • downloadImage

        public long downloadImage(java.lang.String imageLink,
                          java.lang.String fileName)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          BaringoApiException
        Given an image id and a file path to store it to, download the image. File must be writeable and the path must exist.

        NOTE: This is synchronous.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        imageLink - the image link to download (could be a thumb too)
        fileName - name of the file to write to
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - myriad
        BaringoApiException - Imgur didn't like something

      • updateImage

        public boolean updateImage(java.lang.String idOrDeleteHash,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String description)
                    throws BaringoApiException
        Updates an image with a new title and description

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS or AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        idOrDeleteHash - If the image is anonymous, this is the delete hash. If not then it's an imageId and the currently-authenticated account must own it.
        title - title of the image or null if none
        description - description of the image or null if none
        Returns:
        true if it worked
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - C'est la vie

      • deleteImage

        public boolean deleteImage(java.lang.String idOrDeleteHash)
                    throws BaringoApiException
        Deletes an image

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS or AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        idOrDeleteHash - If the image is anonymous, this is the delete hash. If not then it's an imageId and the currently-authenticated account must own it.
        Returns:
        true if it worked
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - C'est la vie

      • favoriteImage

        public Image favoriteImage(Image image)
                    throws BaringoApiException
        Marks the image as favorite for the currently-authenticated user. Note that the Image object needs to be in sync with Imgur because the site's API only acknowledges a toggle of the value. The image object is updated with the new status. If the image is already marked as a favorite, no action is taken.

        NOTE: An account can't favorite its own images.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        image - the image to favorite.
        Returns:
        the updated image object
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - argh

      • unfavoriteImage

        public Image unfavoriteImage(Image image)
                      throws BaringoApiException
        Unfavorites the image for the currently-authenticated user. Note that the Image object needs to be in sync with Imgur because the site's API only acknowledges a toggle of the value. The image object is updated with the new status. If the image is already not favorited, no action is taken.

        NOTE: An account can't unfavorite its own images.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        image - the image to favorite.
        Returns:
        the updated image object
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - argh
